server.model.npcs.instance

Class InstanceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.npcs.instance.InstanceController

  • public class InstanceController
extends java.lang.Object
    The InstanceController() class is used to manage the BossInstance and ZoneInstance enumerations. With this system, the user has the option to purchase an instanced zone to finally 1v1 a boss alone. With the Instance zones comes different values, based on the boss statistics. User then has the option after killing the boss to teleport away whenever they decide (no respawning).
    Author:
    Dennis

      static void executeInstance(Client player, int object)
      Executes the instance after verifying it from isInstanceObject(int) boolean and then checks to see if the player has the amount of GP (995) required to purchase the instance, if the player doesn't then the player is returned with a warning message.
      static boolean isInstanceObject(int object)
      Checks the values of the objects in ZoneInstance and checks if it matches the paramter of the boolean, if so it then returns true.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InstanceController

        public InstanceController()

    • Method Detail

      • executeInstance

        public static void executeInstance(Client player,
                                   int object)
        Executes the instance after verifying it from isInstanceObject(int) boolean and then checks to see if the player has the amount of GP (995) required to purchase the instance, if the player doesn't then the player is returned with a warning message. Using the ZoneInstance values the player is then moved to the instanced area. After the player is transfered to the instanced area, now using BossInstance the values are now used in spawning the boss for the specified instance zone
        Parameters:
        player -
        object -

      • isInstanceObject

        public static boolean isInstanceObject(int object)
        Checks the values of the objects in ZoneInstance and checks if it matches the paramter of the boolean, if so it then returns true. The boolean is then called in ActionHandler first click object, to verify if the object is equal to the values in ZoneInstance else its just a regular object that can't be instanced.
        Parameters:
        object -
        Returns:
        object
